newsitem.title: ZIMBABWE: TABLE-International Holdings raises yr shr.
newsitem.headline: TABLE-International Holdings raises yr shr.

text.p: Note:- The group said it had recently received approval for the establishment of an export processing zone which would focus on plastics manufacturing which is expected to enhance its export earnings.
It said while it was concerned at continuing macro-economic volatility, it expected turnover and share earnings to grow by 30 percent in the 1998 financial year.
